name: GPT-I
description: An automated AI mailbox for businesses that can read, understand, and respond to emails. It can be used to automate customer support, sales, and marketing, and also perform pre-setup tasks on behalf of the user.

capabilities.name: Automation of email processing
capabilities.description: GPT-I is equipped with the ability to handle incoming emails, decipher their contents and respond aptly. It filters emails and responds based on priority, effectively reducing congestion and enhancing productivity.

capabilities.name: Customer support automation
capabilities.description: GPT-I can understand customer queries, complaints, and requests, providing appropriate responses or escalations. This reduces the need for manual interventions, thus increasing efficiency.

capabilities.name: Sales and marketing automation
capabilities.description: With GPT-I, you can automate email marketing campaigns, follow-ups, and process sales orders. It tracks user behavior, personalizes emails to individuals based on their interactions, and nurtures leads into conversions.

capabilities.name: Pre-setup tasks automation
capabilities.description: GPT-I can perform pre-setup tasks on behalf of the user. This could include scheduling follow-up emails, setting up auto-responders and creating task-specific mailing lists.

modules.name: Promotions
modules.description: GPT-I manages promotional emails by sending targeted content to specified user groups. It uses analytics to predict user need for personalized promotional emails.

modules.name: Analytics and Reporting
modules.description: GPT-I tracks and analyzes all email activities, providing visual reports on campaign performance, customer behavior, and email responses. This empowers businesses with actionable insights.

modules.name: AI/ML Core
modules.description: This is the heart of GPT-I, employing machine learning algorithms to read, understand, and respond to emails. It's capable of learning user behaviors and refining email communication over time.

modules.name: Notification
modules.description: The notification module enables GPT-I to provide real-time alerts on received emails, completed tasks, and any system anomalies. This allows users to stay updated on key email activities.

modules.name: Networking & Communication
modules.description: GPT-I handles all communication requirements providing an environment for efficient networking, enabling business users to establish and maintain email connections effortlessly.

modules.name: Content Management
modules.description: Using GPT-I, businesses can manage email content, automate personalized email content creation, and ensure relevant content is delivered to the correct recipients.

modules.name: Scheduling
modules.description: GPT-I has a scheduling functionality that allows for timed execution of tasks such as sending emails at a specified time or setting reminders for follow-up emails.

modules.name: Order Management
modules.description: GPT-I can automate order acknowledgements, updates, and follow-ups through email. It also tracks order status and provides real-time updates to customers.

stories.story: As a customer support representative, I want to automate response to common customer queries so that I can focus on high value tasks
stories.goal: Improve customer support productivity and efficiency
stories.workflow:
User Story Goal: Improve customer support productivity and efficiency

Goal Oriented Code Development Workflow:
1. AI/ML Core: Develop an AI/ML module that can effectively read and understand the content of incoming emails.
2. Networking & Communication: Implement functionality to automatically send responses to the sender of the email. The response content should be based on the understanding of the AI/ML module.
3. Notification: As part of the automated process, generate notifications for the customer support representative whenever the AI module decides a human response is needed, or whenever the system gets a complex query email.
4. Analytics and Reporting: Collect and analyze data on the number of automatically answered emails, the number of emails requiring human interference, efficiency of the AI/ML module, etc. This data can be used to measure and improve the system over time.

After each development step, a corresponding set of tests should be performed to ensure the functionality of each module.
stories.sequence_diagram:
sequenceDiagram 
User->>AI/ML: Pass incoming email for understanding 
AI/ML-->>User: Determines if it can respond 
Note right of AI/ML: If it can answer,
AI/ML->> Networking & Communication: Pass response to email sender
Networking & Communication-->>User: Notify that response sent 
Note right of AI/ML: If it cannot answer,
AI/ML->>Notification: Indicate human response is needed 
Notification-->>User: Alert of task 
User->>Analytics: Log actions 
Analytics->>User: Provide data for reports

tasks.name: Design AI/ML architecture
tasks.description: Design an optimal AI learning model that fits the requirement of understanding emails content

tasks.name: Implement AI/ML architecture
tasks.description: Code the AI/ML module based on designed architecture

tasks.name: Test AI/ML Core
tasks.description: Test the AI/ML core module with various sample emails content to ensure it works correctly

tasks.name: Create automatic response system
tasks.description: Build a system that uses the outputs of AI/ML Core to automatically send replies to email senders

tasks.name: Integrate email communication
tasks.description: Incorporate the ability for the system to send and receive emails

tasks.name: Test Network and Communication
tasks.description: Ensure the response and email communication systems work correctly and reliably

tasks.name: Build notification system
tasks.description: Design a system that will trigger notifications based on AI/ML core outputs

tasks.name: Integrate notification with AI/ML Core
tasks.description: Link the notification system with AI/ML Core to receive necessary triggers

tasks.name: Test Notification system
tasks.description: Test scenarios to ensure notification system triggers correctly

tasks.name: Design analytics and reporting system
tasks.description: Create a means to record and assess data related to automatic replies, human interactions, and AI/ML efficiency

tasks.name: Implement analytics and reporting system
tasks.description: Build the analytics system according to the design and integrate with the rest of the modules

tasks.name: Test analytics and reporting system
tasks.description: Ensure the analytics and reporting systems record data accurately and generate correct reports

stories.story: As a sales and marketing manager, I want to automate emailing prospects and tracking responses so that I can improve my conversion rate
stories.workflow:
1. Leverage the 'AI/ML Core' to parse emails, understand their content, and generate suitable responses.
2. Use 'Networking & Communication' to actually handle the sending and receiving of emails.
3. Extend 'Promotions' module to support automated emailing prospects and tracking conversions.
4. The 'Analytics and Reporting' module should keep track of responses and conversions, providing useful reports.
5. All modules should work together to improve conversion rates through efficient automated emailing and tracking.
stories.sequence_diagram:
sequenceDiagram
    participant User as Sales and Marketing Manager
    participant AI_MC as AI/ML Core 
    participant NC as Networking & Communication 
    participant AR as Analytics and Reporting 
    participant PM as Promotions 

    User->>AI_MC: Provides Email Contents
    AI_MC->>NC: Processes and Sends Email
    NC->>User: Confirmation of Email Sent
    NC-->>AI_MC: Receives Email Reply
    AI_MC-->>AR: Sends Data for Analysis
    AR-->>User: Provides Response and Conversion Reports
    AR->>PM: Updates Promotions based on Reports
    PM->>User: Updates on Advertising Strategies

tasks.name: Setup training and testing environment for AI/ML Model
tasks.description: Setting up the foundational environment where the AI/ML models will be trained and tested.

tasks.name: Train AI model to understand email content
tasks.description: Use a suitable dataset to train the AI model to understand the content of the emails.

tasks.name: Program AI model for response generation
tasks.description: Develop the algorithm for the AI model to generate appropriate responses based on email content.

tasks.name: Implement Email Sending Capabilities
tasks.description: Code the functionality to send emails using an external service.

tasks.name: Implement Email Receiving Capabilities
tasks.description: Code the functionality to receive emails using an external service.

tasks.name: Automate Emailing Prospects
tasks.description: Extend the existing Promotions module to be able to automatically email prospects.

tasks.name: Implement Tracking Conversions
tasks.description: Add feature to keep track of successful conversions from email campaigns.

milestones.milestone: Integration of Analytics and Reporting Module

tasks.name: Implement Response Tracking
tasks.description: Add feature to track responses and behaviour of recipients in reaction to sent emails.

tasks.name: Implement Reporting
tasks.description: Create reports to summarize conversion rates, responses, and other useful measurements.

tasks.name: Integrate all modules
tasks.description: Integrate AI/ML Core, Networking & Communication, Promotions, and Analytics & Reporting modules to work together.

tasks.name: End-to-End testing
tasks.description: Test the whole system to ensure all modules work together seamlessly, and the user story goal is met.

stories.story: As a user, I want my pre-setup tasks to be automated so that I can focus on other important tasks
stories.workflow:
1. User input is received: The Networking & Communication module receives an email instructing it to carry out a pre-setup task.
2. Understand user input: The AI/ML Core uses natural language processing (NLP) to read, understand the email.
3. Identify and schedule task: The AI/ML Core identifies the task needed to be accomplished, the Order Management module defines the sequence of operations, then the Scheduling module schedules it.
4. Execute task: The appropriate module(in this case, the Order Management module) performs the task.
5. Send feedback: Once the task is performed, the Networking & Communication module sends an email in response to the initial email, notifying the user that the task has been completed.
stories.sequence_diagram:
sequenceDiagram
 User ->> Networking & Communication: Send email
 Networking & Communication -->> AI/ML Core: Forward email
 AI/ML Core -->> AI/ML Core: Understand email
 AI/ML Core -->> Order Management: Identify task
 Order Management -->> Scheduling: Define operations
 Scheduling -->> Order Management: Schedule Operations
 Order Management -->> Task Module: Execute Task
 Task Module -->> Networking & Communication: Notify completion
 Networking & Communication ->> User: Send confirmation email

milestones.milestone: Setting up the Communication & Networking module

tasks.name: Establish email receiving functionality
tasks.description: Implement functionality that allows the module to receive emails

tasks.name: Implement email sending functionality
tasks.description: Implement functionality that allows the module to send emails

tasks.name: Develop the Natural Language Processing (NLP) component
tasks.description: Develop the component of the AI/ML Core that understands natural language

tasks.name: Task Identification Functionality
tasks.description: Develop a component that based on the data received from the NLP component can identify what tasks need to be performed

tasks.name: Task Sequencing Functionality
tasks.description: Create functionality that defines the sequence of operations for each identified task.

tasks.name: Task Execution Functionality
tasks.description: Develop the component that actually perform the tasks.

tasks.name: Task Scheduling Functionality
tasks.description: Develop a module that schedules tasks based on their sequence

tasks.name: Module Communication
tasks.description: Ensure proper communication and data transfer of all modules

tasks.name: Master control flow
tasks.description: Setup a master control flow that correctly dictates which module is called at what time and in what order

tasks.name: Feedback loop
tasks.description: After tasks are executed, ensure that feedback is sent back to the user through the Networking & Communication module

mermaid_er_diagram:
erDiagram
  User {
    int id
    string name
    string role
    string email
  }
  Email {
    int id
    User sender_id
    User receiver_id
    string content
    Task task_id
    ResponseStatus response_status_id
  }
  ResponseStatus {
    int id
    string status
  }
  Task {
    int id
    string name
    string description
    TaskStatus status_id
  }
  TaskStatus {
    int id
    string status
  }
  Analytics {
    int id
    Task task_id
    Email email_id
    User user_id
  }
  Notification {
    int id
    User user_id
    Email email_id
    Task task_id
  }
  AI_ML {
    int id
    Task task_id
    Email email_id
  }
  Schedule {
    int id
    Task task_id
    datetime time_scheduled
  }
  OrderManagement {
    int id
    Task task_id
    TaskStatus status_id
  }
  Promotions {
    int id
    User user_id
    Analytics analytics_id
  }
  
  User "1" -- "0..*" Email
  User "1" -- "0..*" Notification
  User "1" -- "0..*" Promotions
  User "1" -- "0..*" Analytics
  
  Email "1" -- "0..*" Notification
  Email "1" -- "0..*" AI_ML
  Email "1" -- "0..*" Analytics
  Email -- ResponseStatus
  
  Task "1" -- "0..*" Email
  Task "1" -- "0..*" Notification
  Task "1" -- "0..*" AI_ML
  Task "1" -- "0..*" Analytics
  Task "1" -- "0..*" Schedule
  Task "1" -- "0..*" OrderManagement
  
  TaskStatus -- Task
  TaskStatus -- OrderManagement
  Analytics -- Promotions

models.name: User
models.description: This model stores the user's details including name, role, and email. It serves as a reference for other models.

models.name: Email
models.description: The Email model archives all incoming and outgoing emails associated with tasks and response status.

models.name: ResponseStatus
models.description: This model keeps track of the email response status. This is helpful for identifying emails that require immediate attention.

models.name: Task
models.description: The Task model manages individual tasks associated with emails from their initiation to completion.

models.name: TaskStatus
models.description: This model monitors and logs the status of tasks to track progress.

models.name: Analytics
models.description: The Analytics model stores data related to task and email analytics for reporting purposes.

models.name: Notification
models.description: The Notification model handles all notifications related to emails and tasks for users.

models.name: AI_ML
models.description: This model manages the data processed by the AI/ML Core. It links tasks and emails with AI processing.

models.name: Schedule
models.description: The Schedule model handles all task scheduling records, allowing for timely task execution.

models.name: OrderManagement
models.description: This model manages the status and updates related to orders processed via email.

models.name: Promotions
models.description: The Promotions model manages data related to promotional campaigns and uses analytics for targeting.
